reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 254/04: USE OF MONEY HELD IN TRUST FOR THE ONTARIO APPLE MARKETING COMMISSION
reg_info.reg_name_text: USE OF MONEY HELD IN TRUST FOR THE ONTARIO APPLE MARKETING COMMISSION
reg_info.act_under: Farm Products Marketing Act   Loi sur la commercialisation des produits agricoles

content.section: Use of money held in trust
content.content: 1. (1) The Commission shall pay to the local board known as the Ontario Apple Growers all money that it holds in trust for The Ontario Apple Marketing Commission. O. Reg. 254/04, s. 1 (1). (2) The Ontario Apple Growers shall use the money received under subsection (1) only for the purpose of research that benefits apple growers. O. Reg. 254/04, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Commission shall pay to the local board known as the Ontario Apple Growers all money that it holds in trust for The Ontario Apple Marketing Commission. O. Reg. 254/04, s. 1 (1).

(2) The Ontario Apple Growers shall use the money received under subsection (1) only for the purpose of research that benefits apple growers. O. Reg. 254/04, s. 1 (2).

content.section: Use of money held in trust
content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 254/04, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 254/04, s. 2.
